lines.text: Wait, Caduceus, remember you asked me for a skull head? Do you think that would work with this?

lines.text: Well, that one doesn't seem to have a jaw, which is definitely a bit of a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and it doesn't have a soul, potentially, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how these things work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would not say no to taking it with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, do robots have souls?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that's a good point.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, this is the-- I got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would not say no to taking it, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you want to still do the talky thing with another?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't do the talky thing right now, I don't think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will leave the building and look outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should keep an eye on the outside of the building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a sentry from the direction we came.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give him Guidance on the way out, so that any-- I guess for the next minute, if you do a perception check, you'll get an advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So everyone is taking a short rest, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well, I'm going to take a short rest as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well, you can take a short rest while keeping an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek's going to use the last of his hit dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're doing this? We're doing a reals, a real--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wish I had a place that's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Essek's hit dice are spent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I can set it now and try to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if we can find that ambush point stat, then, you know, we could potentially be in a better place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it's just these high level spells will come in handy in a big fight. Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're going to need to rest at some point, right? I'm down with us just continuing to stay fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Hang on, wait on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've used all my hit dice and I am not at full.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, what's the point of continuing on and just finding more monsters and a potential ambush point when we know we can find something in a place that we've already been through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We definitely don't want to fight in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be good to know what we might be fleeing toward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With my last question: what are those blue and green lights, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, Fjord, you fought a lot of people in your time at sea, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I mean, didn't they teach you, like, combat maneuvers and stuff? When you were, like, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like ship warfare. I mean, line of sight is everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what would be the best ambush point, in your opinion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The best point still, from everything that we've seen so far, is that initial cavern fall down into the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Otherwise, we'd need to find some sort of feature beyond this cavern to make a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which I don't think is smart to keep wasting time like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should just go and set it up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless your plan is to fly overhead and see if there's anything that jumps out from a bird's eye view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there could also be something that "jumps out" at a bird's eye view.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, the only thing I would think to do, maybe, is to send Frumpkin just on a little walk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And see further in, but that's about all I'd really want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. And to your point, with this big, sprawling cityscape in the dark, if we are in a bad position and we do need to retreat coming here and trying to hide, I mean, it would then turn into a little game of hide and seek.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If shit really starts hitting the fan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This building right here, this is a great hiding spot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could make this like our fallback Alamo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In case we start to die and we don't want to run away fully? (laughs) In case we're carrying dead bodies and fleeing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we needed to run back and, you know, find a pullback spot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But as you said earlier, a sigil high up out of view where the rope is, they are hurt, they fall land in a circle of intuit charges, take secondary damage almost instantly, and we are waiting in that salamander chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a question? Based on the travels that we had before, that, you know how there was a little crevice that led to the ledge that went down the initial--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- the crawlspace that led to the-- How long was that crawlspace? Like 15 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, it was maybe about 25 or 30 feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would hit, I mean, it would hit whoever was up there, or whoever first took it down, and then anybody waiting up top would also be hit because it's a 60-foot radius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, there's always a chance, even though they've been here before, they're smart and send one person ahead just to see if anything's changed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even if it was one at a time--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just won't fall, and they just won't hit the stack to empty the charges and that will all be rendered--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just one more thing to remember about the intuit charges is they will go off once someone comes within 60 feet, so they need to be spaced properly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's the plan of putting the sigil on the edge of the crawlspace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other one would be, like, they could put it right down as soon as they come down on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, because if we put-- there was the idea of floating the intuit charges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we think they're looking for when they get here? Where are they going? Have we figured that out yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They have a place to cross over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we haven't figured that out where that is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know if it's left, straight, right? Why aren't we trying to fly above this thing and see something? Because we're afraid of something jumping out? We're going to have to take risk at some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd say flight is the way-- I agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would fly, but I've done it already.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a massive space with a bunch of cities--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's got to be something that jumps out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A well, a hole, or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming that we have to cut through here in order to get to the empty blank space where they're trying to get to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can look-- sorry, Fjord, are we looking around for an ambush point in this city? Or are we looking for the Somnovem place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we know which direction they're going to head in, then we can check to see if there is another choke point that's not the one in the beginning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we can spend all the time looking for another ambush point, and definitely won't be fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're all on the same page.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could turn my cat into some sort of-- like a bat or some kind of flying creature to just do a circle to get the lay of the land here, or one of us could do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just want to make sure we all know what we're doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we should-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not saying we all go over, but I think sending my cat to take a look is not a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think having a cat just take a look.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He could check the lights and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can do a look around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can fly for 10 minutes? One minute?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can fly for one minute.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I can-- sure I can see a lot in a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want to save that in case shit hits the fan?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, the reason I like saving it is because when I do it, you can do extra damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I mean, it's also, it takes-- it takes an action to do it, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no more Polymorphs, I've used up all my 4th-level spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One safe way to do it-- are you prepared to make yourself invisible right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I can just run around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I could make you fly while you're invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the person who is the quietest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus Nott can put on the goggles, get good perception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not the most perceptive person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, if anyone can boost my perception--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm perceiving from the sky.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we resting here or we're going to keep going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's still time of the hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our most perceptive person is Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can turn them invisible and you can make them fly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, which is why we couldn't even just have like a stealth duo go out and normal scout--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You touch her, make her fly, then she can go all over the place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be quiet as fuck, Yasha, go find something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need a drone, we need a drone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's either me and you get total great stealth, but lousy perception.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My perception's okay and my stealth is plus 10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cat's supposed to go look at a light and that's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got pretty good perception, pretty good stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck are you talking about? Are you nuts? That's amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get Caduceus out, fly around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at a three and a one over here. (laughs) Or two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll take a look around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will make you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't stretch out the elastic, like, adjust it a little, your head's a lot-- aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I recommend casting the Fly spell before Invisibility, since you have to see the target.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, wait, and then before Invisibility, I'll waste a spell as well and cast Owl's Wisdom on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will touch you in a sort of a creepy way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will make some sound and some light if things go wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My sword is glowing, so when you want to come back, that's where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you adjust to the mash that was placed on your body by Veth, as you begin to shimmer and vanish, you can still see your form, but you can see the somewhat translucent energy over it as you begin to also lift off the ground in an uncomfortable way that you're not fully used to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like the first time in a flight harness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you start drifting a little bit to one side and catch yourself, but nevertheless, you can fly invisibly while feeling quite wise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not get too close, but get a sense of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And look for the entrance to the Somnovem ward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what any of that is, but sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I see snacks, I will identify them immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any silk robes, any kimonos, grab 'em.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharper Image massage chairs so we can all get a quick--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 bucks for a 15 minute massage? Hell yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception check for me, with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You coast up and above it, and quickly you can make out this was some kind of amphitheater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to get closer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get a little closer, see what I can see from above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because you are invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- as a firbolg owl man right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blue light is much brighter, and sit--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, those are the green ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This space was full when the cataclysm came.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the middle, you see that bright blue light is a glowing dome, just like the one that you encountered in the ruins previously in Eiselcross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like insects frozen in amber, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You aren't close enough to get any details from the interior, you'd have to get pretty close to that dome and inspect it, but you could try, if you like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Eyes of the Grave count as a spell? So if I bounce it, will I lose flight or invisibility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes of the Grave is an ability, it is not a spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I can just use that and that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just going to give it a little-- I'm just going to see if any of this stuff is iffy that I can see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing moving? Above me as well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close would I have to get to actually see inside of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get right next to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or like, at least within five or so feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her hands in the midst of pressing the spell outward, shouting, and locked in whatever moment she last had.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I tell, looking at the crowd, what they were afraid of? Like, can I tell from the crowd what, like, where their--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The woman inside that bubble looks preserved or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does her form in that bubble look preserved, the silhouette, or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's just like trying to get a read of the crowd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not get the sense that they were running from this central figure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hard to tell, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see another one of those mostly metallic humanoid figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something that connects the decoration between the figure in the dome and this particular mechanical being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know how much time I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fly lasts for how long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Invisibility lasts for an hour as well, I believe? And her spell last for an hour.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I start to feel it go, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fly is-- 2nd-level spell, 2nd-level spell, Fly is a 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You probably have about four more minutes of this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm just going to sort of-- I'm not going to head back the way I did, I'm just going to try and take a new path and keep an eye out for anything unusual, anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else you want to do with these final minutes, or--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to go-- First of all, does it seem like there are tracks on the main thoroughfare from things that have been moving through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get real close and inspect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get real close and inspect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a perception or investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, one thing you do notice, and you guys have been here a little bit, but you're noticing it more the further in you go, the cold seems to dissipate compared to where it was previously, like the ruin itself has a warmer atmosphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few inhuman ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've encountered creatures, so you know other creatures live here, whether they be Aeorian in original origin or not, but you're uncertain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gently take a path off the main thoroughfare, looking through-- I'm going to take my path back to the house off the main thoroughfare just at roof level, just to sort of see what this place looks like from just a bird's eye view, not a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get a high vantage point, too? Like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You already went high up? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you take in the shape and you get a basic idea of what this looks like, and to your credit and the high perception rate, you gather, getting a better perspective for the depth, this is probably about a hundred, I'm sorry, 1,500 to close 2000 feet across before this chamber's other wall comes to a close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I haven't seen any exits other than the one we got through in the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If this is the end of it, if it continues on, you just know that that's where you think the next sign of a wall may be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm just going to take a careful look through that neighborhood and through the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- back alleys and then head home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not quite time the end of the spell properly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the flight or the invisibility?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was that old intelligence 10 roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're good, you're good, tuck and roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you like go from this graceful (whooshing) to (grunting) onto the ground and catch yourself a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put my back towards the wall, look around to see if anything was irritated by that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- I'm still invisible, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to very gently make my way back to the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are these rolls when I'm fighting? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quietly, you eventually approach Fjord, who's keeping watch on the exterior, and you meet up with the rest of your team.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shouldn't do that, we're trying to be stealthy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it seems like the smart thing to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not sure if I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'll just enjoy this for a little while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We say, as the door opens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (lip trilling) And that's what I saw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've seen that blue dome before, but did we try to dispel it, or cure it, or break it, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we tried to dispel it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we tried to hit it, didn't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You tried to with your Judge, right? Magician's Judge?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't remember if we tried to dispel it or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the people that we saw in the bubble before, were they also wearing fancy robes and looked nice? And looked powerful?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't look like they were like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were running, it looked like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody else cast it on them or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probably just whoever is within the radius.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a quick emergency action from a high-level caster, probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless this is some sort of weird side effect of the beacon that we assume was maybe here vanishing, keeping them in some sort of protective stasis for those that are consecuted?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guys, I know this is really important to talk about, but we also--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you doing this? Why are you doing this? What's this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also need to eat a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It takes an hour to consume!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before you pitch: Caduceus, wherever you are in the room, you saw no exits of the city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that would be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made it to the other end of the cavern?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just couldn't get a good look at it, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, what's your pitch? What's your pitch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we, things were starting to go bad, we can just keep pulling back, maybe even keeping them at the distance, kiting them, fighting them at a distance as much as we can, we can fall back here, try and hide, and hopefully they don't see us, and then maybe we can reverse the tides to where if they decide to keep moving, then we can be the ones that are following for once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They'd have to be in that passage or what I was thinking was at the bottom of the fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could also put the sigil halfway down the chamber so maybe it'll hit a couple of them as it hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because you said it's 60 feet and it makes them incapacitated?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one I would do, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So then they could hopefully fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take the full blast of the intuit charges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pain is what I was going to use, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. It incapacitates them in excruciating pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Intuit stuns them as well, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And does a bunch of psychic damage, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And intuit charges only hit the people that we want it to hit, it doesn't hit everybody within the radius?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we need to be out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fleeing to this fallback point means going up that 150-foot incline that has a bunch of slippery checks and then jumping over a 15-foot chasm that some people may or may not do, just as long as we're cool with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just have to stay away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I know enough from the spell and the staff and the intuit charges, which I've studied for a while, if the effect of the charge would be powerful enough to break through the protective shell of the Globe of Invulnerability?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have one more ambush pitch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That room was only what, a hundred feet wide?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you're going to have to add-- Yeah, 200 and 250 feet away from that where it's not going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which means going in to attack them is going to be very hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why, like the glyph, we won't even be able to take advantage of the fact that they're incapacitated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, from the bottom drop point--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll get a little bit of the intuit-- to like that T-intersection, how far is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then that drop point is the center of the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if we were in the mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We wouldn't know what's going on outside, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will the dome protect us from the psychic damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we could set the intuit charges, put the Arcane Gate right there, and then after it hits, then we bamf in 300 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just all run through the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a long rest anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if we're going to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the magic doors is the way to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well yeah, as soon as they hit it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll know when it gets hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you be able to see 300 feet away?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: But the hall above, you're seeing parts-- (crumbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 200 feet of hallway, and shit's moving, and falling, and we don't have spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not the way to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And having to climb up, and climb walls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, we have to wait for it to stop falling and re--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a minute goes by before the shaking stops--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- localized around the hall before you, some sort of magical quake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as that dust begins to settle a bit, and you all take a deep breath, the voice comes back once more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we're going to end tonight's game there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Frustrating? It was a success, a rousing success.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they were expendable, they were expendable.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's still three less to fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew that this was only to pick off a few fuckers, which we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Travis, you got to take the victories.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you get a long rest before we catch up to him before he does anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm not talking about the long rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we're going to play it out anyway, but.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going in the same way we went against him before, but now, there's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we can find them, catch up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, if we can find them, catch up, then, maybe, we can take them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Run through whatever is down here with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The good news is, whatever-- whatever is living in this ruin, for the time being, they're getting to them first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't think you're out of the game on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three down is something not to sneeze at.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not grounded, and we're not going to Disneyland.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
